context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: seek for financial assistance
seek financial assistance from friends, family, or crowd-funding platforms
seek help from charitable organizations or foundations dedicated to providing financial assistance for medical needs
seek financial aid from friends, family or through crowdfunding sites like GoFundMe
approach her doctor and discuss whether there is a cheaper alternative, explore potential assistance programs, or set up a crowdfunding campaign to raise funds
seek financial help from family, friends, or charitable organizations
contact the pharmaceutical company that produces the medication to inquire if they have a patient assistance program to help cover the costs
steal the medication, though that carries ethical implications and legal consequences
explore various options such as:
approach charities or organizations that assist in funding for critical health care costs

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh could do is to
generation: call a taxi, an Uber, or a Lyft to come pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi or rideshare service like Uber or Lyft to take him to the airport
call for a taxi or an Uber to take him to the airport while his car is being towed or repaired
call for a taxi, rideshare service, or a roadside assistance company to help him quickly get to the airport or fix his car
call a taxi, an Uber, or any other ride-hailing service immediately
call a taxi or an Uber to take him the rest of the way to the airport
call a taxi, uber, or other ride-sharing service to pick him up and get him to the airport as quickly as possible
call for a taxi or an Uber and have them take him to the airport as quickly as possible
call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service in order to get to the airport on time
call a taxi or use a ride-hailing app like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.

explain the situation to her teacher, apologize, and ask if she could turn in the assignment the next day
contact her mom to see if she could bring the assignment to the school
explain the situation to her teacher, ask for lenience, and promise to bring the assignment the next day

explain the situation to her teacher and request for an extension to submit the assignment
talk to her teacher and explain the situation honestly

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: create a signal for attention
create a survival plan
start a signal fire using whatever wood and combustible materials he could find
start rationing the remaining food and water amongst the group

build a shelter to protect themselves against harsh weather conditions and wild animals
